CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 29, 1961, pg. 16 reads: "Trinity Honorees, Aides - Among those who were honored by the Help-a-Little Club of Trinity AME Church, recently, were: Mrs. Esther Green, center front, worthy grand matron of the Omega Grand Chapter, who was cited as a prominent civic and fraternal leader; and a quartet of mothers in front row: Mmes. Sallie Traynham and Mattie Spence, left front; Mmes. Ethel Leftwich and Laura White, right front. Participants, back row, left to right, are: the Rev. Augustus C. Sumpter, speaker; Mrs. Lucinda Harper, mistress of ceremonies, and the Rev. J.H. Williams, host pastor.  Mrs. Alma A. Polk is host president. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait from left, front row: Ethel Leftwich, Sallie Traynham, Esther Green, Mattie Spence, and Laura White; back row: Rev. Augustus C. Sumpter, Lucinda Harper, and Rev. J. H. Williams, posed in Trinity AME Church
